reference: Quran: Beginning of every Surah (chapter) except one and many other places. The first verse (ayat) of Surah ar-Rahman (Surah 55) consists only of this Name.
1.english_info: He who wills goodness and mercy for all His creatures

reference: Quran: Beginning of every Surah (chapter) except one and many other places (there are a total of 114 Surahs in the Quran.)
2.english_info: He who acts with extreme kindness

3.english_info: The Sovereign Lord, The One with the complete Dominion, the One Whose Dominion is clear from imperfection

4.english_info: The One who is pure from any imperfection and clear from children and adversaries

5.english_info: The One who is free from every imperfection

6.english_info: The One who witnessed for Himself that no one is God but Him. And He witnessed for His believers that they are truthful in their belief that no one is God but Him

7.english_info: The One who witnesses the saying and deeds of His creatures

english: The Exalted in Might and Power
8.english_info: The Strong, The Defeater who is not defeated

9.english_info: The One that nothing happens in His Dominion except that which He willed

10.english_info: The One who is clear from the attributes of the creatures and from resembling them

11.english_info: The One who brings everything from non-existence to existence

english: Have Absolute Power Over All Matters
12.english_info: The Maker, The Creator who has the Power to turn the entities

13.english_info: The One who forms His creatures in different pictures

english: Condoner (He Who is Ready to Pardon and Forgive)
14.english_info: The Forgiver, The One who forgives the sins of His slaves time and time again

english: Absolute Vanquisher (Possessor of Who Subdues Evil and Oppression)
15.english_info: The Dominant, The One who has the perfect Power and is not unable over anything

16.english_info: The One who is Generous in giving plenty without any return. He is everything that benefits whether Halal or Haram

english: Opener of the Gates of Profits
18.english_info: The Opener, The Reliever, The Judge, The One who opens for His slaves the closed worldly and religious matters

19.english_info: The Knowledgeable; The One nothing is absent from His knowledge

20.english_info: The Constrictor, The Withholder, The One who constricts the sustenance by His wisdom and expands and widens it with His Generosity and Mercy

21.english_info: The Englarger, The One who constricts the sustenance by His wisdom and expands and widens it with His Generosity and Mercy

22.english_info: The Abaser, The One who lowers whoever He willed by His Destruction and raises whoever He willed by His Endowment

23.english_info: The Exalter, The Elevator, The One who lowers whoever He willed by His Destruction and raises whoever He willed by His Endowment

24.english_info: He gives esteem to whoever He willed, hence there is no one to degrade Him; And He degrades whoever He willed, hence there is no one to give Him esteem

25.english_info: The Dishonourer, The Humiliator, He gives esteem to whoever He willed, hence there is no one to degrade Him; And He degrades whoever He willed, hence there is no one to give Him esteem

26.english_info: The Hearer, The One who Hears all things that are heard by His Eternal Hearing without an ear, instrument or organ

27.english_info: The All-Noticing, The One who Sees all things that are seen by His Eternal Seeing without a pupil or any other instrument

english: Possessor of Authority of Decisions and Judgment
28.english_info: The Judge, He is the Ruler and His judgment is His Word

english: Authorized and Straightforward Judge of Dealing Justly
29.english_info: The Just, The One who is entitled to do what He does

30.english_info: The Subtle One, The Gracious, The One who is kind to His slaves and endows upon them

31.english_info: The One who knows the truth of things

32.english_info: The Forebearing, The One who delays the punishment for those who deserve it and then He might forgive them

33.english_info: The Great One, The Mighty, The One deserving the attributes of Exaltment, Glory, Extolement, and Purity from all imperfection

34.english_info: The All-Forgiving, The Forgiving, The One who forgives a lot

35.english_info: The Grateful, The Appreciative, The One who gives a lot of reward for a little obedience

36.english_info: The Most High, The One who is clear from the attributes of the creatures

english: Greatly Abundant of Extent, Capacity and Importance
37.english_info: The Most Great, The Great, The One who is greater than everything in status

38.english_info: The Preserver, The Protector, The One who protects whatever and whoever He willed to protect

39.english_info: The Maintainer, The Guardian, The Feeder, The One who has the Power

english: Ever-Reckoner (the One Who Takes Account of All Matters)
40.english_info: The Reckoner, The One who gives the satisfaction

41.english_info: The Sublime One, The Beneficent, The One who is attributed with greatness of Power and Glory of status

42.english_info: The Generous One, The Gracious, The One who is attributed with greatness of Power and Glory of status

43.english_info: The Watcher, The One that nothing is absent from Him. Hence it’s meaning is related to the attribute of Knowledge

44.english_info: The Responsive, The Hearkener, The One who answers the one in need if he asks Him and rescues the yearner if he calls upon Him

45.english_info: The Vast, The All-Embracing, The Knowledgeable

46.english_info: The Wise, The Judge of Judges, The One who is correct in His doings

english: the One Who Tenders and Warm Hearts
47.english_info: The One who loves His believing slaves and His believing slaves love Him. His love to His slaves is His Will to be merciful to them and praise them

english: Ever-Illustrious (Oft-Brilliant in Dignity, Achievements or Actions)
48.english_info: The Most Glorious One, The One who is with perfect Power, High Status, Compassion, Generosity and Kindness

49.english_info: The Resurrector, The Raiser (from death), The One who resurrects His slaves after death for reward and/or punishment

50.english_info: The Witness, The One who nothing is absent from Him

english: the Only One Certainly Sound and Genuine in Truth
51.english_info: The Truth, The True, The One who truly exists

52.english_info: The Trustee, The One who gives the satisfaction and is relied upon

53.english_info: The Most Strong, The Strong, The One with the complete Power

54.english_info: The One with extreme Power which is un-interrupted and He does not get tired

56.english_info: The Praiseworthy, The praised One who deserves to be praised

57.english_info: The Counter, The Reckoner, The One who the count of things are known to him

58.english_info: The One who started the human being. That is, He created him

english: The Reinstater Who Brings Back All
59.english_info: The Reproducer, The One who brings back the creatures after death

60.english_info: The Restorer, The Giver of Life, The One who took out a living human from semen that does not have a soul. He gives life by giving the souls back to the worn-out bodies on the resurrection day and He makes the hearts alive by the light of knowledge

61.english_info: The Creator of Death, The Destroyer, The One who renders the living dead

62.english_info: The Alive, The One attributed with a life that is unlike our life and is not that of a combination of soul, flesh or blood

63.english_info: The One who remains and does not end

64.english_info: The Perceiver, The Finder, The Rich who is never poor. Al-Wajd is Richness

65.english_info: The Glorious, He who is Most Glorious

66.english_info: The Unique, The One, The One without a partner

68.english_info: The Eternal, The Independent, The Master who is relied upon in matters and reverted to in ones needs

english: He Who is able to do Everything
69.english_info: The Able, The Capable, The One attributed with Power

70.english_info: The Powerful, The Dominant, The One with the perfect Power that nothing is withheld from Him

71.english_info: The Expediter, The Promoter, The One who puts things in their right places. He makes ahead what He wills and delays what He wills

72.english_info: The Delayer, the Retarder, The One who puts things in their right places. He makes ahead what He wills and delays what He wills

73.english_info: The First, The One whose Existence is without a beginning

74.english_info: The Last, The One whose Existence is without an end

75.english_info: The Manifest, The One that nothing is above Him and nothing is underneath Him, hence He exists without a place. He, The Exalted, His Existence is obvious by proofs and He is clear from the delusions of attributes of bodies

76.english_info: The Hidden, The One that nothing is above Him and nothing is underneath Him, hence He exists without a place. He, The Exalted, His Existence is obvious by proofs and He is clear from the delusions of attributes of bodies

77.english_info: The Governor, The One who owns things and manages them

78.english_info: The Most Exalted, The High Exalted, The One who is clear from the attributes of the creation

79.english_info: The Source of All Goodness, The Righteous, The One who is kind to His creatures, who covered them with His sustenance and specified whoever He willed among them by His support, protection, and special mercy

80.english_info: The Relenting, The One who grants repentance to whoever He willed among His creatures and accepts his repentance

81.english_info: The Avenger, The One who victoriously prevails over His enemies and punishes them for their sins. It may mean the One who destroys them

82.english_info: The Forgiver, The One with wide forgiveness

83.english_info: The Compassionate, The One with extreme Mercy. The Mercy of Allah is His will to endow upon whoever He willed among His creatures

84.english_info: The One who controls the Dominion and gives dominion to whoever He willed

85.english_info: The Lord of Majesty and Bounty, The One who deserves to be Exalted and not denied

86.english_info: The Equitable, The One who is Just in His judgment

87.english_info: The Gatherer, The One who gathers the creatures on a day that there is no doubt about, that is the Day of Judgment

88.english_info: The One who does not need the creation

89.english_info: The Enricher, The One who satisfies the necessities of the creatures

91.english_info: The One who makes harm reach to whoever He willed and benefit to whoever He willed

92.english_info: The Propitious, The One who makes harm reach to whoever He willed and benefit to whoever He willed

93.english_info: The Light, The One who guides

94.english_info: The Guide, The One whom with His Guidance His believers were guided, and with His Guidance the living beings have been guided to what is beneficial for them and protected from what is harmful to them

95.english_info: The Incomparable, The One who created the creation and formed it without any preceding example

96.english_info: The Everlasting, The One that the state of non-existence is impossible for Him

97.english_info: The Heir, The One whose Existence remains

english: The Guide to the Right Path
98.english_info: The Guide to the Right Path, The One who guides

99.english_info: The Patient, The One who does not quickly punish the sinners
